articles.author: Joseph Choi
articles.title: Why 2024 could be a record year for cancer cases - Yahoo News
articles.description: A record 2 million new cancer cases are projected to occur in the U.S. in 2024, with incidences of six out of the top 10 cancers expected to rise, according to new projections from the American Cancer Society (ACS). ACS released its “Cancer statistics, 2024” …
